awards:
第37届奥斯卡金像奖(1965)
　　最佳真人短片(提名) 卡森 戴维森

writer.name: 卡森 戴维森 Carson Davidson

director.name: 卡森 戴维森 Carson Davidson

introduction: 14 international awards, including an Academy Award Nomination and the Special Prize of the Jury at Cannes International Film Festival, this film presents a surrealistic and humorous satire on the Madison Avenue image of the world through advertising. It Shows a man sitting in a bathtub on a pier at the Hudson River with a background of the New York skyline. He is typing underwater with the words literally going down the drain. Opens the door, and a stripper wrapped in toilet paper appears, and attempts to seduce him. Neat jazz score by Cool Jazzmen Gerry Mulligan & Bob Brookmeyer.
